Checklist: Job cards in your hands

Mobile application

All the monitoring tasks cannot be performed remotely. You often need visual inspection, human visual inspection. We have designed a mobile application to perform them and stay in touch with the experts at any time. The reporting is automatic

live chat+photos

People on the field have not all the documentation in their bag. They are not necessarily experts. For each task, Checliskt allows the chat with experts and the exchange of media. The line maintenance can send a photo of a situation, the expert can reply with a signed clearance

WILCO integration

The checklists are connected as a live stream in WILCO and are stored in the history of wilco among all the system data streams. You have a complete picture of your systems at any time

offline mode

Inspection tasks could occur somewhere WIFI or 3G is not reachable. We designed the application so that it works without a connection. As soon as you catch the signal, your application gets synchronized

Command from your mobile

Checklist is integrated with WILCO. Therefore, from your mobile, you can command or request the system that is in front of you with your phone!

design your job cards

Wilco designer studio allows you to describe your tasklist as a tree, embed schematics, descriptions with a standard desktop. Those checklists are immediately available to all your technicians and can be asigned on the fly

IT!
